Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://github.com/jqlang/jq/releases/download/jq-1.7.1/jq-1.7.1.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš echo 478c9ca129fd2e3443fe27314b455e211e0d8c60bc8ff7df703873deeee580c2  jq-1.7.1.tar.gz
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf jq-1.7.1.tar.gz
ğŸš cd jq-1.7.1
ğŸš ./configure --prefix=/opt/package/jq-1.7.1
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make install
ğŸš rm -rf
